name: Warface – Yakuza Pack
detailed_description:
This pack offers primary weapons for all classes and a pistol of the elegant “Yakuza” series. You will also receive 1000 Kredits under the patronage of your new allies. Unleash inner demons and let cherry blossoms cover the bodies in your wake!

The contents:



  • Five "Yakuza" series weapons

  • 1000 Kredits

"Yakuza" series weapons included:



  • RPD Custom assault rifle

  • Fabarm XLR5 Prestige shotgun

  • ACR CQB submachine gun

  • M14 Crazy Horse sniper rifle

  • ­M1911A1 pistol

Kredits are a premium in-game currency in Warface. It allows you to purchase weapons, armor, boosters, consumables and much more.

short_description: This pack offers primary weapons for all classes and a pistol of the elegant “Yakuza” series. You will also receive 1000 Kredits under the patronage of your new allies. Unleash inner demons and let cherry blossoms cover the bodies in your wake!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
